title: Error when installing multiple versions of hypre
body:
If you want to report a build error for some package, or a bug in core please use the following template as a guideline:

-----

Summary
```
spack install hypre@2.12.1 hypre@develop
```
Gives:

```
==> mpich@3.3a2 : externally installed in /home/balay/soft/mpich-3.3a2
==> mpich@3.3a2 : already registered in DB
==> netlib-lapack@3.6.1 : externally installed in /usr
==> netlib-lapack@3.6.1 : already registered in DB
==> Installing hypre
==> Error: AssertionError: 
AssertionError: AssertionError: 

/home/balay/git-repo/github/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py:680, in child_process:
     27    
     28                # build up some context from the offending package so we can
     29                # show that, too.
  >> 30                package_context = get_package_context(tb)
     31    
     32                build_log = None
     33                if hasattr(pkg, 'log_path'):
```
### Expected Result

Both versions of hypre package to be installed.


Note: The following works:

```
spack install hypre@2.12.1 && spack install hypre@develop
```
Is this supposed to work? Any idea how to debug further?
